architectural_elements.name: Stone Archways
architectural_elements.description: Tall, gothic archways carved with faded religious symbols and cracks filled with moss.

architectural_elements.name: Stained Glass Windows
architectural_elements.description: Broken panes depicting saints and angels, moonlight shining through in distorted colors.

architectural_elements.name: Altar
architectural_elements.description: A cold marble altar covered in dust, with melted candles and dark stains resembling blood.

architectural_elements.name: Tomb Entrances
architectural_elements.description: Stone doorways leading to narrow burial chambers below, some sealed, others broken open.

architectural_elements.name: Pillars and Columns
architectural_elements.description: Massive stone supports etched with worn inscriptions and faint claw marks.

furniture_and_decor.name: Pews
furniture_and_decor.description: Rows of wooden benches, cracked and splintered, some toppled as if in panic.

furniture_and_decor.name: Candelabras
furniture_and_decor.description: Tall metal stands holding half-burned candles, dripping with wax and rust.

furniture_and_decor.name: Holy Statue
furniture_and_decor.description: A weathered stone statue of a saint or angel, missing parts, with an unsettling expression.

furniture_and_decor.name: Organ
furniture_and_decor.description: An ancient pipe organ, silent and covered in cobwebs. Some keys still press down on their own.

furniture_and_decor.name: Coffins and Sarcophagi
furniture_and_decor.description: Stone coffins lined along the walls, lids cracked or slightly ajar, revealing bones inside.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Delicate webs draped over statues, pews, and candles, shimmering in dim light.

atmospheric_details.name: Incense Smoke
atmospheric_details.description: Faint trails of smoke lingering in the air, though no incense burns nearby.

atmospheric_details.name: Whispering Echoes
atmospheric_details.description: Soft prayers or murmurs reverberating throughout the crypt, origin unknown.

atmospheric_details.name: Chill Air
atmospheric_details.description: Cold drafts passing through cracks in the stone, carrying a faint scent of decay.

atmospheric_details.name: Dripping Water
atmospheric_details.description: Occasional drops falling from the ceiling, echoing through the still air.

interactive_objects.name: Ancient Bible or Tome
interactive_objects.description: A massive book on the altar, its pages brittle and filled with forbidden texts or incantations.

interactive_objects.name: Silver Crucifix
interactive_objects.description: A tarnished crucifix that glows faintly when supernatural entities are near.

interactive_objects.name: Sealed Crypt Door
interactive_objects.description: A locked stone door engraved with names of the dead, requiring a special relic to open.

interactive_objects.name: Offering Bowl
interactive_objects.description: A metal basin once used for holy offerings, now filled with dark liquid and bone fragments.

interactive_objects.name: Chalice
interactive_objects.description: A golden goblet on the altar, with dried blood around the rim.

environmental_effects.name: Ghostly Choir
environmental_effects.description: Soft, distant singing that fades in and out, harmonizing with no visible source.

environmental_effects.name: Flickering Candlelight
environmental_effects.description: Candles that dim and flare unpredictably, casting shifting shadows on the walls.

environmental_effects.name: Rumbling Ground
environmental_effects.description: A faint tremor as if something large moves beneath the crypt.

environmental_effects.name: Phantom Breeze
environmental_effects.description: A sudden gust that extinguishes lights or rustles pages of the tome.

environmental_effects.name: Shadow Apparition
environmental_effects.description: A moving shadow that glides across the walls, mimicking the playerâ€™s motion.

lighting.name: Moonlight Through Stained Glass
lighting.description: Pale light filtered through broken windows, painting the stone floor in fragmented color.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles lining the altar and pews, their flames barely sustaining.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: A single hanging lantern swaying from a chain, creaking as it moves.

lighting.name: Spirit Glow
lighting.description: A faint, ethereal illumination emanating from the tombs, pulsating softly.
